title: Coast to Coast: A Prisoner of My Own Dream
description: At age 65, Brad Storey, a retired painting contractor and father of four, decided to take his dog for a long, long walk: from the Atlantic Ocean in Georgia to the Pacific Ocean in California! He and Xena, a Siberian husky, spent seven months on the road, camping almost every night in a small tent. Unforeseen struggles, inexplicable good fortune and encounters with unusual people filled their days. This is the story of their adventure, a walk from "Coast to Coast!"
author: Brad Storey
